publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2428 Mrs Nanette Milne:Congratulations to Prince Charles and Camilla Parker Bowlesâ€”That the Parliament sends its congratulations to Prince Charles, Duke of Rothesay, and Camilla Parker Bowles on the news of their recent engagement; hopes that the couple will enjoy many years of happiness together; is delighted that the couple have chosen to honeymoon in the beautiful north east of Scotland, and believes that the vast majority of people in Scotland will wish them well in this important step forward.
S2M-2428 Congratulations to Prince Charles and Camilla Parker Bowles (lodged on 11 February 2005) Alex Johnstone*

S2M-2428 Congratulations to Prince Charles and Camilla Parker Bowles (lodged on 11 February 2005) Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Alex Fergusson*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Murdo Fraser*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-2428 Congratulations to Prince Charles and Camilla Parker Bowles (lodged on 11 February 2005) Margaret Mitchell*
S2M-2428 Congratulations to Prince Charles and Camilla Parker Bowles (lodged on 11 February 2005) John Scott*
